column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Be an Atheist Parent
#Text=Being an atheist in a religious culture can be a challenging situation and being an atheist parent is an even more daunting position for one to be in .
#Text=Have you ever asked yourself how you can be an atheist parent ?
#Text=This article will provide some guidance for anyone looking for help on this topic .
#Text=Get started at step one below .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Raise them however you want .
#Text=They 're your kids .
#Text=There are worse kids out there .
#Text=You 'll probably do more harm worrying about every little thing .
#Text=Parenting is about using your instincts , experience and making good use of all the resources you have .
#Text=Religion has little to do with physical difficulties you may have raising children .
#Text=Consider the beliefs you want to pass on to your children .
#Text=Why are you an atheist ?
#Text=How strongly are you committed to atheism ?
#Text=Do you want to actively raise your children as atheists , or expose them to religion and allow them to make up their own minds ?
#Text=You should discuss these questions with the child 's other parent if they will be involved in raising them .
#Text=Think about how you will deal with difficult questions .
#Text=Religions offer their followers answers to ' big ' life questions like " Why do we die ?
#Text=" These questions are bound to arise and it is good to have thoughtful reasoned responses prepared before they do .
